scripts.sync:tauri-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')); const path='src-tauri/tauri.conf.json'; const conf=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path,'utf8')); if (conf.version!==pkg.version){ conf.version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(path, JSON.stringify(conf,null,2)); }"
scripts.pack:release: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$version=(Get-Content package.json|ConvertFrom-Json).version; $date=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd'; $releaseDir=Join-Path $PWD 'release'; $base=\"PulseCoreLite_v$version`_$date\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $releaseDir | Out-Null; npm run tauri:build; $nsis=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/bundle/nsis/*-setup.exe' -ErrorAction Stop; $msi=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/bundle/msi/*.msi' -ErrorAction Stop; $portable=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/pulsecorelite.exe' -ErrorAction Stop; Copy-Item $nsis.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_setup.exe\")) -Force; Copy-Item $msi.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_setup.msi\")) -Force; Copy-Item $portable.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_portable.exe\")) -Force"
scripts.abuild: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$version=(Get-Content package.json|ConvertFrom-Json).version; $date=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd'; $releaseDir=Join-Path $PWD 'release'; $base=\"PulseCoreLite_v$version`_$date\"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $releaseDir | Out-Null; npm run tauri:build; $nsis=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/bundle/nsis/*-setup.exe' -ErrorAction Stop; $msi=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/bundle/msi/*.msi' -ErrorAction Stop; $portable=Get-Item 'src-tauri/target/release/pulsecorelite.exe' -ErrorAction Stop; Copy-Item $nsis.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_setup.exe\")) -Force; Copy-Item $msi.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_setup.msi\")) -Force; Copy-Item $portable.FullName (Join-Path $releaseDir (\"$base`_portable.exe\")) -Force"
